alert.note: Alert for Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 8:24PM CDT until June 03 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Starr County in Deep South Texas... Southeastern Zapata County in Deep South Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Falcon Dam, or 12 miles south of Lopeno, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rio Grande City, Roma, Escobares, El Sauz, Lopeno, Viboras, La Rosita, New Falcon, Los Alvarez and Fort Ringgold County Park. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 778 and 824. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
